cv.title: Full Stack Engineer & UI/UX Designer
cv.summary: Full-stack engineer and UI/UX designer specializing in Next.js, React, and Node.js. I craft intuitive user experiences and build secure Web3 dApps, seamlessly bridging technical development with design excellence and user-centered thinking.

skills.frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Angular, Vue.js
skills.backend: Node.js, Express.js, Go, Python, REST APIs, GraphQL, Microservices
skills.database: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Git, AWS, CI/CD, Webpack
skills.design: UI/UX Design, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Responsive Design, Agile/Scrum
skills.blockchain: Solidity, Ethereum, Web3.js, Hardhat, Smart Contracts, DApps
